name: Prana Alana 5" Shorts - Women's
description:
Performance shorts packed with features, they're made of soft recycled nylon and have no shortage of storage space.Fast drying performance fabric.Invisible zippered stash pocket at the back and right leg.Fabric offers UPF 50+.
